summary: An ordinance relating to the issuance and sale of general negotiable interest bearing serial coupon bonds of the City of Seattle in the sum of Two Million, One Hundred Twenty-five Thousand Dollars ($2,125,000) for the purpose of providing funds to pay a part of the cost of constructing sewer, trunk sewers, pumping plants and appurtenances, as submitted to the electors under Ordinance No. 50287; providing for a change in the form of said bonds and coupons; and amending Section 3 of Ordinance No. 51248.
